Outras informações relevantes

 
The aim of our research is to explore pedagogy transparency in the context of GBL. The general idea is that, if students are told of how they are being taught, this may work in their benefit as to gain more knowledge as they become more aware of the teaching process, and as such have a more effective learning. In addition, we have explored the potential of i* towards more transparent models providing transparency for a game-based learning (GBL) strategy.
